Observed at: Creston 8:00 PM MST Friday 31 March 2023
Temperature: 4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: S 16 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning near midnight. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or wet flurries. High 7.
entry.summary: A few rain showers mixed with wet flurries early in the morning and ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Risk of a thunderstorm in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers in the evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Snow level at valley bottom. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 31 March 2023
